summary: I never perticularly liked the fact that Alduin was more or less an undistinct grey mass of a dragon.  This simple mod converts him into a more traditional black dragon from typical fantasy settings.  It is only a cosmetic change.  It also alters Alduin in the loading screen.
descriptionHtml:
[u][b]Description[/b][/u]

I never perticularly liked the fact that Alduin was more or less an undistinct grey mass of a dragon.  This simple mod converts him into a more traditional black dragon from typical fantasy settings.  It is only a cosmetic change.  It also alters Alduin in the loading screen.


[u][b]Installation[/b][/u]

Extract the archive into the main directory of you Skyrim installation, e.g.

F:\\Games\\Steam\\SteamApps\\common\\skyrim\\

Or you can use the Nexus Mod Manager to install.


[u][b]Uninstall[/b][/u]

Remove the Data\\textures\\actors\\alduin directory.


[u][b]Permissions[/b][/u]

Modders that wish to use all or part of this mod in future works please ask by message first.  I do believe in the collaborative part of modding so in most cases I\'m glad to contribute!  I just want to have some control over my efforts.
author: Prime
